reviews.review: Very good game because you have to use your brain
The best singleplayer game I have ever played.
虽然玩过第一人称游戏，但刚开始玩1代时还是很晕的，然而二代的时候就好很多了。剧情能提起路人的兴趣，比如我除了游戏还花了很多时间去了解背后的剧情。电子音乐很好听，特别是最后一章，浓浓的bug风和警告音的mix。画面很舒服，关卡很有趣。能自己设计关卡更是极好的，现在通关之后一直在设计关卡给朋友玩。
Great puzzels, Great humor, Great game. Also has a two player mode where you get to kill your friends so that is good.

Mejora las características del primero e introduce personajes nuevos, el único mal que le he visto es que solamente por las últimas fases del juego se alarga para enseñarnos más mecánicas y se siente un poco innecesario, sin embargo es uno de los mejores juegos de la época y hoy en dia es obligatorio jugarlo, ademas que tiene niveles hechos por la comunidad por si no te fue suficiente y una campaña co-op que no he jugado porque no tengo amigos en PC :(

Had this game for so long, first playthrough on PS3 again on PC and a lot of Multiplayer. The single-player story is really good. It's reallly funny, captivating and the puzzles are well thought of. The multiplayer is also really enjoyable, and what is cool is that the game is good for people of all ages, I've played with my little cousin (9yo) and he really had fun and I've played with friends from work and everyone enjoys it. I also really enjoy the music. 

So great story, fun co-op, good gameplay and great music. Highly recommend, especially when on sale.

 O modo online tambem é muito bom, tendo missões que requer trabalho em equipe.

Um dos melhores que já joguei (gráficos incríveis e com uma física muito parecida com a realidade - você pode se ver no espelho e a gravidade funciona) 
Uma história muito bem feita, também

问题来了，从来没有晕过3d的我玩传送门居然每次只能玩半个小时，然后就极度眩晕不适，关了游戏得缓上半天才恢复精神。
传送门真的很容易晕，游戏真的是好游戏。

Simply epic. Really the best combination I ever seen when adventure plot was integrated into never-ending string of puzzles!

After Portal-1 that I liked a lot too, Portal-2 came back as complete surprise, which meant, longer! larger! nicer! more adventurous! humorous! Unlike the first part, here the gaming word is just HUUUGE! Series of completely distinct chapters gradually unfolded sophisticated story behind Aperture Science Lab and its main AI project. Such surprising raise to second part is NOT what average gamer can often expect from any average sequel... But perhaps, it's sort of Valve's unique way, eh? :-)
Muy bueno, aunque prefiero el primero. El Co-op muy bien hecho y gracioso por las boludeces que haces o hace tu compañero.

一人称視点のパズルアクション。
シナリオや世界観、そして斬新なゲーム性に定評があり
10年くらい前にちょっとしたブームを巻き起こしたゲームとなります。

前作未プレイのままPORTAL2から始めた場合、冒頭から酷い言葉をなげかけられ不愉快な思いをするでしょう。
逆に前作をプレイしておくと、一転してかわいい事を言う奴だと上から目線でニヤニヤできますので
余裕のある方は1からプレイする事をおすすめします。
(PORTAL1は攻略無し初見プレイでも、3時間程度でクリア可能なボリュームです)

また、ポータルの特性上、入口と出口で重力の方向が違うといった事も頻繁にあり
3D酔いのある方にとっては非常に過酷なプレイ体験を要求されるかと思われます。
興味を持った方の中で、3D酔いの懸念がある人は
前作から遊ぶにしろ、2から遊ぶにしろ、PORTAL1の体験版がありますので
それをプレイしてみるといいかと思います。

と、ここまで書いてようやくゲーム内容についてですが
パズルの難易度としては、簡単すぎず難しすぎずといったところで
周囲を眺めてみたり、適当にマップを歩き回ってみたりしていれば、そのうち答えがわかる程度。
多少タイミングを合わせる局面もありますが、秒単位の長めの猶予がありますし
「答えはわかってるのに要求されるアクションが難しすぎてクリアできない」といった事もありません。
ゲームの九割九分はマイペースでも理詰めで攻略できます。
ちょっと10分20分悩んじゃうような箇所もあるにはありますが
一瞬のひらめきから5分以内にゴールできる内容になっているので、爽快感や達成感はなかなかの物です。

加えて、どんなミスをおかしても必ずやり直しができる構造のマップになっている上
難所を一つ越えるごとにチェックポイント(自動セーブポイント)もあるため
失敗のリスクが少なく気軽に試行錯誤できるのも良い点かと思います。

またFPSという事で身構えてしまいますが、あまり細かな狙いを定める必要はなく
多少ズレても問題ないくらい大らかな調整で
細かな照準が必要な場合は、狙うべき場所がコゲたり模様になってたり一目瞭然なので
この辺も難易度には影響ないかと思います。

以上のように、「パズルを解く」という作業を邪魔する要素は徹底的に潰してあり
テストをクリアする作業を無限に繰り返すための環境が整備されており
(3D酔いしない方には)万人にお勧めしたいゲームかと思います。

Portal 2 is quite possibly the best Co-Op game ever. Only the highest praises.

The single player was OK. I think the original Portal game had a lot more charm. Portal 2, frankly, is tryhard with the one-liners. Perhaps it had already lost the sense of discovery that was present in droves in the original Portal, which contributed to my opinion?

Still, a worthy pick up, pretty sure I got it for $3 on a steam sale which is an insane value for the best Co-Op game ever.

After finishing Portal, I got two copies of this game: one for myself and one to gift to a friend. No regrets. Definitely one of my all-time favourites. Even though the replay value isn't particularly high, the community mods and co-op can keep you entertained after finishing the story.

Ah isso é um clássico! Amo o primeiro e esse igualmente!!! Você está preso em um lugar e tem que sair de lá,  com a habilidade de abrir portais e utilizar algumas poucas ferramentas!  Um jogo desafiador que te faz pensar e repensar, me fez relembrar boas regras de física. Após zerar o jogo é possível continuar jogando nas camaras criadas pelos usuários (muitas delas simplesmente fantásticas) e até mesmo criar seus próprios desafios com a ferramente para criar camaras. Simples de jogar, fácil de entender, boa jogabilidade com controle ou teclado e mouse. É um jogo para quem gosta de lógica e desafio! Aliás algumas as camaras criadas  atualmente pelos usuários são mais desafiadoras que o próprio jogo em sí, na verdade o jogo continua evoluindo e crescendo cada dia mais com uma legião de fãs!
One of the best games I have played, just buy it already...

[h1]Summary[/h1]

Portal 2 is a first person puzzle where you have a binary portal device. You can shot a blue portal and an orange portal and when both exist they are connected and work as a tunnel. You have to escape test chambers by taking advantage of this portal device. The game works the same as the original Portal but with a new engine that gives better graphics, a more elaborate story and extra mechanics and devices. If you liked the original Portal you will probably like this game too.

+ Excellent graphics
+ Excellent voice cast
+ New mechanics
+ Good story
+ Cooperative play
- The first robot can get annoying at first but it does get better overtime

[h1]Review[/h1]

You start off with a cinematic story were your room is being destroyed and you are helped by a robot. This robot will accompany you through the game and to be honest I found him very annoying at first but he does get funnier later so give him a chance. Your objective is to get freedom from the test chambers using the portal device.

The game is the same as the original game but with better graphics and new devices. At first it's more of the same with cubes and buttons but as the game goes on you will find [spoiler]lasers, springs, light bridge, transportation funnel, gel with special properties and so on[/spoiler]. It does make the game much more interesting. I did find the puzzles somewhat easier than the original but the new mechanics compensated.

The story is split into three parts. You will know more more about the background story in the second part, which I found to be the most interesting part of the game with the best puzzles. The game does have a very interesting story although I found it to be a little more artificial than the first game and sometimes unnecessarily cinematic, but just a little.

The voice cast is excellent and truly adds quality to the game. There are three noteworthy characters in this game: Wheatley, GlaDOS and Cave Johnson. There are other important characters but you will definitely know about these in Portal 2. Wheatly is kind of annoying but he does get a lot funnier overtime and you will understand why he is like that. GlaDOS is really angry and has an excellent script and interpretation and she is my favorite. You will find Cave Johnson later and you'll know why he's a nice addition to the game.

After you beat the game you can play community made maps. It's a nice addition and somewhat similar to the advanced maps of Portal. You can also create your own maps. This adds to replayability especially since you can play with a friend cooperatively.

If you liked the original Portal you will definitely like this game as well. If not it's a very interesting puzzle game but I recommend you play the original game first.
